data.name: 狂暴模组

WithPassiveSkills.name: 狂暴模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击时，若自身耐久值百分比低于<color=#F74848>40%</color>，无视目标<color=#F74848>6%</color>护甲值和<color=#F74848>3%</color>闪避值

WithPassiveSkills.name: 狂暴模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击时，若自身耐久值百分比低于<color=#F74848>40%</color>，无视目标<color=#F74848>8%</color>护甲值和<color=#F74848>4%</color>闪避值

WithPassiveSkills.name: 狂暴模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击时，若自身耐久值百分比低于<color=#F74848>40%</color>，无视目标<color=#F74848>12%</color>护甲值和<color=#F74848>6%</color>闪避值

WithPassiveSkills.name: 狂暴模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击时，若自身耐久值百分比低于<color=#F74848>50%</color>，无视目标<color=#F74848>16%</color>护甲值和<color=#F74848>8%</color>闪避值

WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击时，若自身耐久值百分比低于<color=#F74848>50%</color>，无视目标<color=#F74848>19%</color>护甲值和<color=#F74848>10%</color>闪避值

WithPassiveSkills.name: 狂暴模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击时，若自身耐久值百分比低于<color=#F74848>60%</color>，无视目标<color=#F74848>23%</color>护甲值和<color=#F74848>12%</color>闪避值

WithPassiveSkills.name: 狂暴模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects: 攻击时，若自身耐久值百分比低于<color=#F74848>60%</color>，无视目标<color=#F74848>27%</color>护甲值和<color=#F74848>14%</color>闪避值

WithPassiveSkills.name: 狂暴模组
WithPassiveSkills.SpecificEffects:
攻击时，若自身耐久值百分比低于<color=#F74848>60%</color>，无视目标<color=#F74848>35%</color>护甲值和<color=#F74848>18%</color>闪避值；
机兵移动力增加<color=#F74848>1</color>格，移动时无视单位阻挡，攻击位于移动路径上的敌机时，自身触发的<buf ID=900001>[追击]</buf>效果替换为<buf ID=900010>[连续攻击]</buf>

data.introduce: 专为习惯将自己置入险境的机师而设计。
